name: footer-component-02
description: Comprehensive grid-based footer with logo section, company description, colored social media icons, navigation columns (Company, Help), newsletter subscription form, and featured brand logos

files.content:

import type { SVGAttributes } from 'react'

const Logo = (props: SVGAttributes<SVGElement>) => {

export default Logo
